title: Engine Oil Change
description: Keep your engine running smoothly with our premium oil change service. We use high-quality synthetic oils and replace filters to ensure maximum engine longevity and better fuel efficiency for your vehicle.

facility.name: Premium Synthetic Oil
facility.details: We use industry-leading lubricants to reduce engine wear and tear.

facility.name: Filter Replacement
facility.details: Genuine oil filter replacement included to keep your engine clean.

facility.name: Quick Service
facility.details: Our expert mechanics complete the process in under 30 minutes.

facility.name: Waste Disposal
facility.details: Eco-friendly disposal of old oil following environmental safety standards.

title: Battery Charge & Health Check
description: Don't get stranded with a dead battery. Our experts provide complete diagnostic testing, rapid charging, and terminal cleaning to ensure your car starts reliably every single time.

facility.name: Voltage Testing
facility.details: Accurate digital diagnostics to check your battery's current health.

facility.name: Rapid Charging
facility.details: Safe and fast charging using professional-grade equipment.

facility.name: Corrosion Cleaning
facility.details: Removal of acid buildup from terminals for better conductivity.

facility.name: Alternator Check
facility.details: Ensuring your car's charging system is working perfectly.

title: Full Car Repair & Overhaul
description: A comprehensive bumper-to-bumper repair service. Whether it's mechanical failure or structural issues, we restore your car to its factory condition using genuine parts and advanced machinery.

facility.name: Genuine Spare Parts
facility.details: We only use OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) parts for repairs.

facility.name: Computerized Diagnosis
facility.details: Advanced scanning to find hidden mechanical or sensor issues.

facility.name: Expert Technicians
facility.details: Certified mechanics with years of experience in luxury and local cars.

facility.name: Service Warranty
facility.details: Get peace of mind with our 6-month warranty on all major repairs.

title: Engine Repair & Tuning
description: Experience the true power of your vehicle. Our engine tuning and repair service optimizes performance, fixes overheating issues, and reduces abnormal engine noise for a quiet, powerful drive.

facility.name: Performance Tuning
facility.details: Fine-tuning the engine for better torque and horsepower.

facility.name: Leak Detection
facility.details: Fixing oil, coolant, and fuel leaks using pressure testing.

facility.name: Carbon Cleaning
facility.details: Removing internal carbon deposits for smoother acceleration.

facility.name: Belt & Chain Check
facility.details: Inspecting timing belts and chains to prevent engine failure.

title: Automatic Transmission Service
description: Smooth gear shifts are essential for a comfortable ride. We provide specialized automatic transmission fluid (ATF) changes and gearbox health checks to prevent costly transmission failures.

facility.name: Transmission Flush
facility.details: Complete replacement of old fluid with high-grade ATF.

facility.name: Gearbox Diagnostics
facility.details: Electronic scanning for shift delays or transmission slips.

facility.name: Clutch Adjustment
facility.details: Ensuring smooth engagement between the engine and gearbox.

facility.name: Seal Inspection
facility.details: Checking for minor leaks that could cause major gear damage.

title: Electrical System Repair
description: From headlights to complex ECU wiring, we fix all electrical glitches. Our technicians use modern diagnostic tools to solve sensor issues, wiring shorts, and power window failures.

facility.name: Wiring Diagnostics
facility.details: Safe troubleshooting of complex car wiring systems.

facility.name: Light & Horn Fix
facility.details: Repairing and upgrading headlights, fog lamps, and horns.

facility.name: Sensor Replacement
facility.details: Replacing faulty ABS, Airbag, and Oxygen sensors.

facility.name: Dashboard Repair
facility.details: Fixing digital clusters and infotainment system power issues.
